description.value: The chair has an efficient allocated space to hold additional items. This reduces the amount of Bulk the items weigh when stored within the chair, much like a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Backpack]{Backpack}. The first 2 Bulk of items stowed in your chair don't count against your Bulk limit. If you use both chair storage and a backpack at the same time, only 2 Bulk total isn't counted against your limit, much like if you used multiple backpacks or similar items at the same time.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Grand Bazaar
